entity.name: Class
entity.description:
A class is a number of things considered together.
In this part of ISO 10303, the term 'class' and 'set' are synonyms.

entity.name: Class_by_extension
entity.description: A Class by extension is a set that is defined by means of a criterion that does not enumerate the members.

entity.name: Class_by_intension
entity.description: A Class by intension is a set that is defined by enumerating the members.
